marklogic.body:
<b>Buffalo Airport is a Joy to fly out of.
Small, easy to get around. Staff follow you to your parking Spot with a bus, load your baggae and shuttle you FREE of charge to the gate.
No smoked glass at security screening....unlike Pearson. Everything is open for all to see. Unlike Pearson, you can take pictures of whatever you want at Buffalo. Try taking a photo at Pearson, the overzealous security will accost friends and family and demand to see and erase the pictures.
Parking at Buffalo is reasonable as well as the cost of flights. Orlando, pp $89. in April. Pearson, pp $300+.
Friendly security staff....without the attitudes and condescending demeanor.
I think I'll drive to Buffalo.
